data.comment: The match is underway. Bristol City have kicked-off.
Barnsley move into a 1-0 lead through a Michal Helik header.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway. Barnsley with the kick-off.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Jack Hunt.
In the minute 51, Bristol City take a 1-2 lead thanks to Tyreeq Bakinson.
Barnsley make their first substitution with Herbie Kane replacing Romal Palmer.
Elliot Simoes is replacing Clarke Oduor for the home team.
In the minute 73, Antoine Semenyo is on a sub for Nahki Wells for Bristol City.
The home team replace Conor Chaplin with Dominik Frieser.
Tomas Kalas is replacing Chris Martin for the away team.
In the minute 81, Mads Andersen (Barnsley) gets a yellow card.
Callum O'Dowda is on a sub for Jamie Paterson for Bristol City.
Michal Helik is booked for the home team.
Barnsley have been awarded a penalty...
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Tomas Kalas (Bristol City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Cauley Woodrow equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
